name: Chatot

attacks.name: Encore
attacks.effect: Choose an opponent's attack. If they attack, they can only use that attack next turn.

attacks.name: Mimic
attacks.effect: Use the opponent's last attack against them.

attacks.name: Chatter
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

flavor: These things are chatterboxes. Their tendency to control the conversation can be a little annoying to some.
